thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Trump’s Exit From Iran Nuclear Pact Adds Variable to North Korea Talks

author: Andrew Jeong
title: Trump’s Exit From Iran Nuclear Pact Adds Variable to North Korea Talks
text:
SEOUL—President Donald Trump’s decision to withdraw from the Iran nuclear agreement injects a new variable ahead of his upcoming talks with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un.
The move could make it harder to convince the North Korean regime that the U.S. is reliable in standing by any deals it makes. But it also signals a tougher line that could give Mr. Trump more leverage with a counterpart that Washington regards as having a history of backtracking on nuclear deals.
... RELATED VIDEO Will Trump's Iran Bet Pay Off? After President Donald Trump's big gamble to pull the U.S. out of the Iran nuclear deal, the focus now shifts to Tehran, the Iranian people and America's allies. Gerald F. Seib explains the high stakes. Photo: Getty
